channel.title: surprise on On Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in surprise on On Software Engineering

item.title: Iteration 9 - custom functions
item.description: Welcome to the 9th iteration of WebCalc. Previously I managed to extract billing module from the app module and started differentiating users from one another. This time I’ll enable the users to define their own functions. To IDEs then. But first I must apologize for what I’ve done last time. I coupled my User class with Spring’s UserDetails. It’s obvious to me now, in my face even. Apparently, it wasn’t back then.
